choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, milk-based yogurt, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter, pistachios, and cashews
I can do that! Here's a healthy meal plan for seven days:
Day 1: Oatmeal with fruit (such as blueberries or raspberries) added.
Day 2: Scrambled eggs with vegetables (such as spinach, tomatoes, and mushrooms).
Day 3: Quinoa salad with grilled chicken and vegetables.
Day 4: Lentil soup with a side of whole wheat crackers.
Day 5: Grilled salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and carrots.
Day 6: Veggie stir-fry with tofu and tempeh.
Day 7: Chia seed pudding with coconut milk and fruit (such as mango or papaya).
I hope you find this meal plan helpful! Let me know if you have any other questions.
